topic.title: Pausing collection for single Output streams

body.p: To avoid problems caused by increasing stream link buffer sizes in Output stream, there is an option to temporarily stop collecting files when the number of files in any link buffer in the stream reaches a specified limit. The limit is defined with node parameter MaxFilesInLinkBuffer in CG Collector Node.

Whenever the number of files in any link buffer in the Output stream reaches the limit defined, file collection is stopped for that particular Output stream until all link buffers are empty again. The other instances of the Output stream continue processing normally.
